name: Ball Roller Game
description:
This is my first ever Unity game and I made it for my game dev class. This game is a simple platformer where you control a ball and navigate through 4 levels with obstacles and moving platforms and collect as many coins as you can.

CONTROLS

'W' = Forward

'A' & 'D' = Turn left and right respectively

'S' = Decelerate/Brake

'Space' = Jump
